string.value: Mir has started arguing strongly for the elimination of the Strange Pigs... What should you do? Talk to Mir.

#p1013000# says that he and you should eliminate the #o1210111#s. No matter how many times you tell him how dangerous that is, #p1013000# just won't let up. Although it is a bit worrisome, since he is so confident, maybe you should try? Go to the #b#m100030320##k.\r\n\r\n#o1210111##r #a225091##k

Wow, you were able to eliminate the #o1210111#s much easier than you expected. #p1013000# seems to be pretty strong. When you tell #p1013000# that, he says that when a Master and a Dragon puts their powers together, something like this is easy.
If we work together, the #o1210100#s are a cinch! Well?Come on! Let's eliminate them! Please, master!\r\n#b#L0#It's too dangerous. Those #o1210100#s are stronger than normal #o1210100#s.#l\n#k
I know, but we can do it! Besides, if it gets too dangerous, we can run away. Just trust me! Well, master? Please?
All right! Let's hurry to the #b#m100030320##k and teach those #r#o1210111#s#k a lesson! I think eliminating #r20#k of them should be enough? Let's go!
Oh come on, really? Master, are you chicken?!
Woohoo! I told you it'd be simple! #o1210100#s are nothing for us!\r\n#b#L0#Wow! #p1013000#, you're stronger than I thought!#l\n#k
Hehehe. Master, when you and I work together, there's nothing that we can't defeat.
Hey, we should show off our accomplishment! Let's go tell #bDad#k what we did! Hehe, he'll probably be really happy and tell us we did a good job!
Are you still scared? #r20 #o1210111#s#k is nothing! If something happens, we can just run away! Let's go to the #b#m100030320##k and try attacking at least just one.
